page.title: 15BLAGDON SCHOOL ACTIVITIES.
page.content: When I changed schools about six months ago, I saw a large difference from the other school where I had been for about seven years. This school is much{less strict}than my old one, and the teachers are more{friendly.}At my former school I was doing more, much harder, (and more{boring work).}At the other school we might have been set ten fraction multiplication sums to do in about five minutes, or three long division sums in five minutes. Whereas at this school we are either given different,or more interesting work, with more time to develop & enjoy it. It wasn't a happy school,as I felt that the teachers only cared about our work. I think my new one cares about us as well. Also too much emphasis was put on doing well. Here it's not. At times here there isn't enough forcing of rules. But I prefer this school.
